name: longPress

name: clickByTextIfTextPresent
description: Click on the element if the text is visible in the image; if the text is not visible, scroll until it appears.

name: swipeEvent
description: Performs swipe action on the ios device

name: minimumWait
description: Pauses the execution for 1000 millisecond

name: elementIsEnabled
description: Verifies if element is enabled. Timeout to wait for the element would be 'exist_timeout' which is set in user preference or test case settings.

description: Performs ADB actions on the specified device.

parameters.name: Emulator Event
parameters.param_description: Parameter to perform the emulator Event

name: toggleWifi
description: Toggles wifi to a specified mode.

parameters.name: Wifi Status
parameters.param_description:
Value to this parameter would be 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' 
TRUE - turns on wifi
FALSE - turns of wifi
If TRUE is used but already wifi is ON, it would just return true without performing anything.
If FALSE is used but already wifi is OFF, it would just return false without performing anything.

parameters.param_description:
Data for this parameter would be as follows: \n
'today' - gets today's date 'today+1' - gets tomorrow's date 'today-1' - gets yesterday's date Similarly, 'today+n','today-n' would get the respective date

name: randomAlphabets

parameters.name: Prefix
parameters.param_description: Prefix that needs to be concatenated with the generated data

parameters.name: Suffix
parameters.param_description: Suffix that needs to be concatenated with the generated data

parameters.name: Runtime parameter
parameters.param_description: Runtime parameter name in which generated data would be stored

name: clickIfExist
description: Clicks on an element if the element is present. If element is not present, then the timeout would be 'exist_timeout' set in user preference or test case settings.

name: scrollIntoElement
description: Scrolls to a web element.

description: Gets CSS of an element and stores the fetched value in runtime parameter.

name: Store from JSON
description: Gets value of the specified key in JSON and store the value in runtime parameter

parameters.name: Json
parameters.param_description: Base JSON in which value needs to be fetched

parameters.name: Key

parameters.name: Runtime parameter

name: elementIsChecked
description: Verifies if element is checked.

name: closeApp
description: Closes the ios App

name: screenLockStatus
description: Locks the ios device screen

name: unlock
description: Unlocks the android device screen

parameters.name: Password

name: waitUntilElementNotPresent
description:
Waits for the element until the element is not present on the screen 
 Maxtimeout to stop waiting would be 'exist_timeout'

name: scrollToBottom
description: Scrolls towards bottom of the ios device

name: minimise
description: Minimises the browser window.

name: subtractionOfValues
description: Performs subtraction of values and stores the final value in runtime parameter. parameter n - n number of parameters can be added parameter n-1 - The last parameter would be the expected value

description: Clicks on an element if the element is present. \n If element is not present, then the timeout would be 'exist_timeout' set in user preference or test case settings.

name: launchApplication
description: Launches the browser with specified URL and specified browser capabilities

parameters.name: URL
parameters.param_description: URL of the web application

parameters.name: Capabilities
parameters.param_description: Browser capabilities in JSON format

name: StartApp
description: Starts the application in ios device

parameters.name: Bundle Id
parameters.param_description: Bundle Name of the application that needs to be launched

name: executeRestAPI
description: Executes REST API for authorisation type 'Basic Auth'

parameters.name: Base URI
parameters.param_description: Endpoint URI of the REST API

parameters.name: Method
parameters.param_description: HTTP method of the REST API

parameters.name: Header
parameters.param_description: Request header needs to be added in JSON format in a parameter of type JSON

parameters.name: Query params
parameters.param_description: Query params needs to be added in JSON format in a parameter of type JSON

parameters.name: Request body
parameters.param_description: Request body needs to be added in JSON format in a parameter of type JSON. If request body is of XML can be added as a text in test data

parameters.name: Username
parameters.param_description: Username to be specified in a parameter

parameters.name: Password
parameters.param_description: Password to be specified in a parameter

parameters.name: Runtime parameter 1
parameters.param_description: Runtime parameter 1 is to store the response body in JSON format

parameters.name: Runtime parameter 2
parameters.param_description: Runtime parameter 2 is to store the response code

parameters.name: Runtime parameter 3
parameters.param_description: Runtime parameter 3 is to store the response message

name: insertData
description: Inserts values to the specified table.

parameters.name: Table
parameters.param_description: The name of the table where data is to be inserted.

parameters.name: Values
parameters.param_description: The values or data to be inserted.

name: waitUntilElementPresent
description: Waits for the element until the element is present on the screen.Max timeout to stop waiting would be 'exist_timeout'.

name: getTime
description: Gets time in specified time format and stores the value in runtime parameter

parameters.name: Time
parameters.param_description: Data for this parameter would be as follows: 'now' - gets current time 'now+1' - gets 1 hour from now Similarly, 'now+n','now-n' would get the respective time

parameters.name: Time format
parameters.param_description: Time format would be the format in which time needs to be generated

parameters.name: Meridiem
parameters.param_description: Meridiem that needs to be concatenated with the generated time as suffix to be added in this parameter

parameters.name: Runtime parameter
parameters.param_description: Runtime parameter name to store the date and time generated

name: connectToMongoDb
description: Establishes a connection to a MongoDB instance using the provided connection string.

parameters.name: Connection String
parameters.param_description: The string required to establish a connection to a MongoDB instance.

name: toggleBluetooth
description: Toggles bluetooth to a specified mode.

parameters.name: Bluetooth Status
parameters.param_description:
Value to this parameter would be 'TRUE' or 'FALSE' 
TRUE - turns on bluetooth
FALSE - turns of bluetooth
If TRUE is used but already bluetooth is ON, it would just return true without performing anything.
If FALSE is used but already bluetooth is OFF, it would just return false without performing anything.

name: isLocked
description: Verifies if the device is locked. Returns true if device is locked, otherwise returns false. If true is returned, the step is considered passed; else, it fails.

name: airplaneModeStatus
description: Verifies the status of the Airplane Mode(enabled/disabled). Returns true if airplane mode is enabled, otherwise returns false. If true is returned, the step is considered passed; else, it fails.

name: updateDocuments
description: Updates documents in a specified collection and database according to the given filter and update criteria, then stores the number of documents that were updated.

parameters.name: Database Name
parameters.param_description: The name of the database where the documents are to be updated.

parameters.name: Collection Name
parameters.param_description: The name of the collection where the documents are to be updated.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.param_description: The filter criteria to identify which documents to update.

parameters.name: Update
parameters.param_description: The document that needs to be updated in the specified collection within the given database and filter criteria.

parameters.name: Update Type
parameters.param_description: Specifies the type of update (i.e., ONE/MANY).

parameters.name: Runtime Parameter
parameters.param_description: Stores the count of documents updated.

description: Clicks on an element
